item.title: About
item.description: Start of another blog, developer focused, as a way to write about, keep track of and archive various technologies and trends. Hopefully this involves into something for now but mostly its a place to put random thought. This blog was started in 2014 and has continued to receive updates all the way up until the end of 2023.
